problem_text_cn: 如图所示,AB是⊙O的直径,弦AC与AB成30°的角,AC=3,CD与⊙O相切于点C,交AB的延长线于点D,则CD的长等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, chord AC and AB form an angle of N_0, AC = N_1, CD is tangent to ⊙O at point C, and the extended line of AB is at point D, then the length of CD is equal to ( )
raw_answer: 解:如图:连接OC∵OA=OC∴∠OAC=∠OCA=30°∴∠COD=∠OAC+∠OCA=60°∵CD是⊙O的切线∴OC⊥CD,且∠COD=60°∴∠D=30°∴∠D=∠CAO∴AC=CD=3故选:C．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质,熟练运用切线的性质解决问题是本题的关键．
